faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions

general.question: Is this extension free?
general.answer: Yes, we offer a free version for all users. We also provide a paid Pro version with additional advanced features.

general.question: How do I install the extension?
general.answer: You can download it directly from the Chrome Web Store or click the 'Download' button on our website.

features.question: How many tabs can I manage?
features.answer: Free version supports up to 50 tabs, while Pro version has no limit.

features.question: Does it support tab grouping?
features.answer: Yes, we support both custom grouping and smart grouping features.

technical.question: Which browsers are supported?
technical.answer: Currently supports Chrome, Edge and other Chromium-based browsers.

technical.question: Where is my data stored?
technical.answer: All data is stored locally on your device. We don't upload your browsing data.
